City Council
============

[Font Size:](javascript:void(0); "default font size")
[+](javascript:void(0); "larger font size")

* [Reddit](javascript:shareLink('reddit') "Click to share with Reddit")

|  |
| --- |
| [Download City of Keller   Code of Ethics](https://www.cityofkeller.com/home/showpublisheddocument/14491/635859441641670000)  ++++++++++++  [Download City Council Procedures and Decorum Policy](https://www.cityofkeller.com/home/showpublisheddocument/23966/637190245834600000) |

The Keller City Council is composed of a mayor and sixÂ council members in places designated as 1 through 6, all elected at-large for three-year terms byÂ a majority of the registered voters within the city limits of Keller.   
  
City Council Place 6 was added and terms extended to three years with citizen approval of amendments to the City Charter in November 2010.

Under the provisions of the City Charter, and subject only to the limitations imposed by the Texas Constitution,Â Texas law and the City Charter, the Keller City Council enacts local legislation, adopts the annual operating budget and sets policy.

Regular Keller City Council meetings are held on the first and third Tuesday of each month at Keller Town Hall, 1100 Bear Creek Parkway. Meetings generally start with a Pre-Council meeting at 5 p.m. followed by the Regular City CouncilÂ meeting at 7 p.m. All Keller City Council meetings are open to the public.

### Mayor and City Council Members

| Position | Name | EMail | Elected | Term Expires |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| Mayor | Armin Mizani | [amizani@cityofkeller.com](mailto:amizani@cityofkeller.com) | May 2023 | 2026 |
| Council Member,   Place 1 | Shannon Dubberly | [sdubberly@cityofkeller.com](mailto:sdubberly@cityofkeller.com) | May 2024 | 2027 |
| Council Member,  Place 2 | Greg Will | [gwill@cityofkeller.com](mailto:gwill@cityofkeller.com) | May 2024 | 2027 |
| Council Member,  Place 3 | Karen Brennan | [kbrennan@cityofkeller.com](mailto:kbrennan@cityofkeller.com) | MayÂ 2025 | 2028 |
| Council Member,  Place 4 | Tag Green | [tgreen@cityofkeller.com](mailto:tgreen@cityofkeller.com) | May 2025 | 2028 |
| Council Member,  Place 5 | Chris Whatley | [cwhatley@cityofkeller.com](mailto:cwhatley@cityofkeller.com%3Fsubject%3Dcwhatley@cityofkeller.com) | May 2023 | 2026 |
| Council Member,  Mayor Pro Tem | Ross McMullin | [rmcmullin@cityofkeller.com](mailto:rmcmullin@cityofkeller.com) | May 2023 | 2026 |

Â To contact all Keller City Council Members, email [mayorandcouncil@cityofkeller.com](mailto:mayorandcouncil@cityofkeller.com)

The mayor and council members are also available to meet with homeowner associations, civic groups, clubs, scout troops, school students andÂ nonprofit organizations. For scheduling and information, call 817-743-4000 or email [townhall@cityofkeller.com](mailto:townhall@cityofkeller.com).
